verses.verse: Blessed <WH835> is he whose disobedience <WH6588> is forgiven, <WH5375> whose sin <WH2401> is covered. <WH3680>
Blessed <WH835> is the man <WH120> to whom Yahweh <WH3068> doesn't <WH2803> impute iniquity, <WH5771> in whose spirit <WH7307> there is no deceit. <WH7423>
When I kept silence, <WH2790> my bones <WH6106> wasted away <WH1086> through my groaning <WH7581> all day long. <WH3117>
For day <WH3119> and night <WH3915> your hand <WH3027> was heavy <WH3513> on me. <WH3955> My strength was sapped <WH2015> in the heat <WH2725> of summer. <WH7019> Selah. <WH5542>

I acknowledged <WH3045> my sin <WH2403> to you. <WH3680> I didn't hide my iniquity. <WH5771> I said, <WH559> I will confess <WH3034> my transgressions <WH6588> to Yahweh, <WH3068> and you forgave <WH5375> the iniquity <WH5771> of my sin. <WH2403> Selah. <WH5542>

For this, <WH2623> let everyone who is godly pray <WH6419> to you in a time <WH6256> when you may be found. <WH4672> Surely when the great <WH7227> waters <WH4325> overflow, <WH7858> they shall not reach to him. <WH5060>
You are my hiding place. <WH5643> You will preserve <WH5341> me from trouble. <WH6862> You will surround <WH5437> me with songs <WH7438> of deliverance. <WH6405> Selah. <WH5542>
I will instruct <WH7919> you and teach <WH3384> you in the way <WH1870> which <WH2098> you shall go. <WH3212> I will counsel <WH3289> you with my eye on you. <WH5869>

Don't <WH5483> be like the horse, or like the mule, <WH6505> which have no understanding, <WH995> who <WH5716> are controlled <WH1102> by bit <WH4964> and bridle, <WH7448> or else <WH1077> they will not come near to you. <WH7126>
Many <WH7227> sorrows <WH4341> come to the wicked, <WH7563> but loving kindness <WH2617> shall surround <WH5437> him who trusts <WH982> in Yahweh. <WH3068>
Be glad <WH8055> in Yahweh, <WH3068> and rejoice, <WH1523> you righteous! <WH6662> Shout <WH7442> for joy, <WH3477> all you who are upright in heart! <WH3820>
